resources.string: Allow [VaxWallet] to use your camera for scanning QR codes to store your card.
BC Vaccine Card app is the official mobile application from the Government of British Columbia which allow you to store and organze the proof of vaccination of you and your family members.
You don\'t have any vaccine card yet
Scan, upload or get access to your proof of vaccination.
Scan a vaccine card QR code
Use an image of your QR code
Enter info to get your card
Camera permission is required to scan BC Vaccine Card QR codes.
Oops, It seems your device does not have a rear camera\nWe do not support scanning BC Vaccine Card QR codes using the front camera at the moment.
Please scan an official BC Vaccine Card QR Code.
Please upload an official BC Vaccine Card QR Code.
